summary: Added comprehensive glass effect styling section to AI_BOT_SECTION_LAYOUT_FIX.md. Documented that glass effect styles must remain identical to desktop version across all breakpoints. Included complete CSS code for .liquid-glass, ::before, and ::after pseudo-elements. Added strict rules: no changes to opacity, blur, background-color, or border-radius. Only order changes, not visual styles.
current_status: Documentation updated with glass effect styling requirements. Glass effect must be identical to desktop version on mobile/tablet.
